message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product for $130. It's a steal at this price!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand your value for the product, but I believe I can offer you $110 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $110 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $120.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.
I see, Alice. Considering the product's value, I would like to propose $115 as my offer.
